API Operations¶

POST /suma

Sum of two lists of numbers.

Form Parameters

  • list(number) – v1 (required) – The name the of the author of the book

  • list(number) – v2 (required) – The name the of the author of the book

Example Request

curl -X GET http://127.0.0.1:5000/suma -d '{"v1": [1,2,3],"v2": [2,3,4]}'

Example Response

[3, 5, 7]
POST /resta

Subtraction of two lists of numbers.

Form Parameters

  • list(number) – v1 (required) – The name the of the author of the book

  • list(number) – v2 (required) – The name the of the author of the book

Example Request

curl -X GET http://127.0.0.1:5000/resta -d '{"v1": [1,2,3],"v2": [2,3,4]}'

Example Response

[3, 5, 7]
statuscode 200

no error

statuscode 500

The parameters are not valid.

statuscode 500

Variables should be of type list of numbers.

statuscode 500

The lists should have the same size.

POST /mult

Multiplication of two lists of numbers.

Form Parameters

  • list(number) – v1 (required) – The name the of the author of the book

  • list(number) – v2 (required) – The name the of the author of the book

Example Request

curl -X GET http://127.0.0.1:5000/mult -d '{"v1": [1,2,3],"v2": [2,3,4]}'

Example Response

[2, 6, 12]
statuscode 200

no error

statuscode 500

The parameters are not valid.

statuscode 500

Variables should be of type list of numbers.

statuscode 500

The lists should have the same size.

POST /divis

Division of two lists of numbers.

Form Parameters

  • list(number) – v1 (required) – The name the of the author of the book

  • list(number) – v2 (required) – The name the of the author of the book

Example Request

curl -X GET http://127.0.0.1:5000/divis -d '{"v1": [1,2,3],"v2": [2,3,4]}'

Example Response

[0.5, 0.6666, 0.75]
statuscode 200

no error

statuscode 500

The parameters are not valid.

statuscode 500

Variables should be of type list of numbers.

statuscode 500

The lists should have the same size.

statuscode 500

Division by 0 is not possible.
